name: Alien Shooter in Space Cradle - Virtual Reality
detailed_description:
Description

Alien Shooter in Space Cradle - Virtual Reality - Sci/Fi shooting game in virtual reality. We want to provide players from all over the world with an immersive VR interactive experience.

Story

In the year 2053 a group of astronauts are sent to investigate and salvage the long lost starship. That ship disappeared mysteriously 10 years before on its maiden voyage and with its return comes even more mystery as the crew discover the real truth behind its disappearance and something even more terrifying.....

RELOAD YOUR GUN AND TRY TO SURVIVE!

Features of the game

  • 3D- and 360°- Environment
  • fully Virtual Reality optimized Player Control
  • increasing difficulty with each round
  • local Highscore
